column2: was a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] in France founded in 1996.<ref>http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%89tudes_sur_J._R._R._Tolkien#Associations_.C2.AB_loi_1901_.C2.BB (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref> The last recorded activity was in 2001.<ref>http://www.jrrvf.com/compagnie/compagnie.html (accessed 05-12-2011)</ref>
